TopicTitle: Question: Where to post a mission report/story?

Articles.Content:
I'm planning to post the first part of a mission report series that will also include some of my own writing, as well as screenshots. I know it will have a lot of writing at the start, but I don't know if the amount of story will change as I develop the series.

What I'm wondering is whether it should go in Mission Reports (like the well known Long-Term Laythe Mission series), or in Fan Works as writing?

Also, what does "AAR" mean in the context of fan works?
AAR = After Action Report. AAR is about the same as a mission report. Personally, it's entirely up to you as both locations are technically correct.

thank you

I suppose I'll put it in whichever section is more frequently viewed
It should go in mission reports

It should go in mission reports

Now I'm somewhat confused

Could you explain why its closer to being a mission report than the other thing?

Is it fictional or a real flight?

Fiction can be in Fanworks, a real flight can be in Mission Reports, but honestly the line is blurred.

Is it fictional or a real flight?

Fiction can be in Fanworks, a real flight can be in Mission Reports, but honestly the line is blurred.

alright then

And yeah, it'll be real flights
